title: Time Was - A romantic comedy ..... with a kink
description: A romantic comedy for the 21st Century. What happened when Henry met Sophie. Sophie, early twenties, free and easy with the tequila shots, the nightclubs, but a little lost in life. Fed up with dirty laundry, lousy hangovers and lousy sex. Henry, late forties, company director with a penchant for fine wines, Napoleon brandy....and handcuffs. Woke up one day to find that his get up and go had got up and gone. Follow Henry's and Sophie's bawdy adventures into the kinkier side of life, adventures that don't always turn out as planned.
author: Paul     Adams
